text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I am agnif a technical account
manager here at the AWS office in Boston
today I am going to show you how to
change the billing information that
appears on the pdf version of the AWS
invoice that you receive by email let's
get started the AWS invoice that you
receive as a PDF by email uses the
billing information that's associated
with the payment method that you have
set up in your AWS account
you can update the payment preferences
in AWS billing with a few easy steps
to update your billing information
sign in to the AWS Management console
and go to billing
then choose payment preferences from the
left navigation pane
find your default payment method under
default payment preferences and then
choose edit
update the information for your current
payment method
choose save changes to save your changes
the name on the billing address will now
appear in the attention section of the
invoices that you receive from now on
note your updated billing information
affects only future invoices to get an
updated PDF invoice for a particular
billing period update the billing
information that's associated with your
payment method then open a case with AWS
support
and now you know how to change the
billing information that appears on the
pdf version of the AWS invoice that you
receive by email
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
